author: fnathan
title: Arsenal transfer blow as it emerges Monaco star Kylian Mbappe had posters of Real Madrid on his bedroom wall as a kid
text:
EFL kyl any hope Arsenal transfer blow as it emerges Monaco star Kylian Mbappe had posters of Real Madrid on his bedroom wall as a kid 
Gunners have been targeting the French sensation for a while, but childhood snaps show him posing with Cristiano Ronaldo Pictured
